scenario_text.value:
(Everyone’s probably in the cafeteria by
now.)
(I should head back.)
Oh, good. You’re all here!

Well, how could we say no? You seemed so
desperate.

You’re one to talk. You were a bundle of
nerves until just now.
Hey! You promised not to mention that!

(Minoru was pretty upset before. Looks like
he’s in better shape now.)
(Not to mention the others.)

Sorry to make you worry about me all the
time, Takuma. I’m feeling better now.
Yeah, you really bounced back!
Good. I’m glad to hear it.
I’m sure it was because of you, Takuma!
Haru, Miyuki, thanks for coming too.
Sure.
Sure...
So, about us going to rescue Miu...
Right, let me just start by saying something.

I really didn’t want to get you all involved
in this, but...
...thanks.

Whoa! Did you guys hear that? I think Kaito
actually showed some appreciation just now.
Minoru, no need to be sarcastic.

That’s right! Kaito was just being sincere.
No need to make fun of him for that.
Minoru can’t take anything seriously, can he?

What? Don’t you get it? I’m just trying to
lighten the mood!

(Yeah, and everyone is really upset right
now.)
(Though sometimes Minoru can go too far.)

Listen, Kaito, you don’t have any reason to
feel like you’re dragging us into this.
Yeah! We all want to rescue Miu anyway!
If anything, I think we owe you an apology.

We all knew you were anxious to start looking
for Miu. Sorry we took so long.

No, it’s cool. After what happened yesterday,
I get it.
Anyway, will you help me out?
You bet!
Hey, not so fast!

Look, given the situation, I hate to bring
this up, but are you serious about this?
Shuuji?
What’s that supposed to mean?
Exactly what it sounds like.

You know how dangerous it is out there!
Remember the enemy monsters? The strange fog?

Maybe things worked out for us yesterday, but
we don’t know if that’s true for Miu.

Shuuji, that is so not cool! You’re tellin’
Kaito to his face his sister might be dead?!

Nooo, I’m just trying to look at this
objectively...

What’s to say Miu hasn’t already wound up
like Ryo?
Shuuji! How can you even say that?

I... I’m just trying to look at this
objectively...

So you’re saying Miu’s objectively doomed?!
How dare you?!

Hey! No need for this to get violent! Don’t
forget we’ve got little kids here.
I’m scared...
Scared...
Sorry.

But what you’re saying is the one thing
I will not accept!

I... I have a responsibility for the lives of
everyone here!

I’m the leader! It’s up to me to weigh the
options and make the most prudent decision!

Don’t give me that! You’re just looking for
an excuse to cover for your own cowardice!
Kaito, stop! That’s enough!
I am NOT a coward!

Maybe a hothead like you can’t see it, but as
the oldest one here, I have a responsibility!
Shuuji, please... You should stop too...
Shut up! Not another word from you!
Shuuji! Please, try not to get so worked up.

Kaito has his own responsibility. He’s Miu’s
older brother. That’s why he’s so desperate.
That’s...well...

Hah! As if a spineless creep like you could
ever understand how I feel!

You have no idea how much responsibility goes
into being a big brother!
So now you’re calling me irresponsible?!

Oh, we’re never going to get anywhere if this
keeps up.

I don’t like it when everybody fights like
this.
Yeah, me neither.

(I know I should stop this argument before it
goes on much longer, but how?)

(Should I side with Kaito? Respect Shuuji’s
opinion?)
(Or try to enlist help from somebody else?)
(What’s the best way to stop this fight?)
Honor Shuuji’s point.
Side with Kaito.
Try to enlist help.
Honor Shuuji’s point.

Kaito, I need you to calm down and just hear
Shuuji out, okay?

Not you too, Takuma! Are you tellin’ me to
give up on Miu?
Because if you are, you’re dead to me.

No! All I’m saying is to respect Shuuji’s
opinion. You can see his point, right?!

We just need to calm down and think of a plan
before we start looking. That’s all.
Yes. That’s what I was trying to say.

You see? It’s not like Shuuji’s dead set
against going to rescue Miu.
I’m not exactly all in favor of it either...

(No, Shuuji! That’s just the kind of comment
that keeps us from getting anywhere!)
Side with Kaito.

Shuuji, don’t you think we should give Kaito
a hand here?

So you’re saying you’re fine with risking
everyone’s lives all over again?

Of course not, but we can’t just leave Miu
out there.

Besides, even if we decide not to go, Kaito
will take off on his own.
It’s what I was plannin’ from the start.

And I’ve got no problem going back to that.
I’ll find Miu alone if I have to.

Oh, quit saying you’ll do it alone. For the
hundredth time, I’ll go with you.

Shuuji, do you really intend to let Kaito and
Dracumon go out there by themselves?
No! That’s not an option either!
Shuuji...
Grr...
Try to enlist help.
Hey, Minoru! Say something!
What? Me?!

All right, uh, what do you say we take
a vote?

A vote? I don’t know, people’s lives are on
the line, here.
Ha... Haha, just kidding!
Minoru...
I mean, I don’t know what to say!

Anyway, uh, why don’t we split up? Then one
group can search while the other stays here!

I don’t like that. If we’re going to look for
Miu, we should all go.

How are you against all my ideas? Why’d you
even ask for my opinion then, Takuma?
Sorry!

Forget it. I know I asked for your help, but
it’s not worth all this trouble.
So long! I’m outta here.
Stop going off on your own!
Outta my way!
Shuuji! Kaito! Both of you, enough!!!
Wha’?!
Uh...Aoi?
Wow! She sure shut them up!
Yes, that was quite impressive.
(I didn’t realize Aoi could get so loud.)

What is the point of you two fighting like
this? We’re wasting time!

Kaito, is fighting with Shuuji going to help
rescue Miu?
Well, no, but—

Shuuji, you keep talking about how dangerous
it is, but do you never intend to leave?
I didn’t say that—
Obviously, we need to find Miu...

But we also need to try and find a way home.
At least...that’s what I think.
Huh? Why’d Aoi get so quiet all of a sudden?

Heh, she was really picking up steam there,
but then I guess she got self-conscious.

You’ve got nothing to be ashamed of, Aoi!
That was incredible just now!

Oh no, um, I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to get so
carried away...
No, Aoi, you were right. I’m sorry.
Me too. Sorry I kinda lost it.

Welp, sounds like we’re all agreed! We’re
going to rescue Miu!
Uh, Minoru? Who gave you the final say?
What? Somebody had to say it, right?
So, where do we go?

I think yesterday we decided to check the
amusement park.

Right, according to that Tentomon guy, after
Miu got away from Archnemon...
...that’s where she was headed.

Tentomon was the one who said it was the
shiny place, right?
The shiny place? It sounds lovely!
But are we sure that’s where she went?
Not a doubt in my mind.
She’s always loved amusement parks.

So if she suddenly realized one was here,
she’d head straight for it.

And there was that giant ring in the shiny
place. It looked really cool!

Besides, everybody knows kids are crazy about
amusement parks.

I bet you both like them too, right Haru?
Miyuki?
I...dunno.
Dunno...
What?! You’ve gotta be kidding me!

(They...don’t know? Does that mean they’ve
never been to an amusement park?)

Well, it sounds like she’s probably at the
amusement park. We’d better get going.
Bye everyone... Good luck.

Oh, no. I don’t think so. You’re both coming
with us.
Again? Why?

Because we can’t just leave you on your own
knowing there are monsters kidnapping children!
Isn’t that right, everyone?
Yeah, no objections from me!
Me either!
Oh... Okay.
Okay...

But, do we know the way to the amusement
park?

We saw it from the radio tower yesterday.
Finding it won’t be a problem.

I’m sure there must be a path through the
forest that leads in that direction.

Right. So we just gotta get through the
<color=#B41919>forest</color>. I’ll take point. You guys stay close.

I’ll stay in front of you to protect you,
Shuuji.

Did I ask you to do that? No, you just tag
along and try not to slow us down.
Okay. Sorry.
*sigh*
(What’s he sighing about?)

(Actually, that reminds me. He was acting
kind of weird yesterday.)
Hey, Haru?
What?
About yesterday, uh... What happened exactly?

(Miyuki’s always kind of strange, but
sometimes Haru just seems...off.)

(Like he’ll suddenly say something mature, or
act like he’s seen through things.)
I’m not really sure. Sorry.
Okay. Sorry if I bothered you.
(Is he not aware of it himself?)

Hey, Takuma, Haru, Miyuki! Hurry up or you’ll
get left behind!
Oh, yeah, wait up!
Come on, you two. We need to hurry.
Miyuki, let’s go.
Go...
